td.p: FPV (first person view) quadcopter racing has become the latest craze in the RC community. Flying one of these small racers is a one of a kind experience with out of body phenomena and rushes of adrenaline. I found this hobby through the many YouTube videos of high speed races, close calls, and crashes. Currently I only fly recreationally, but due to its recent increase in popularity, there are now racing leagues which I hope to soon compete in. Minimal cost and great online communities make this hobby a very rewarding experience.
